channel.title: Comments on: Mike asks, “Can I use one keyboard and mouse with two computers?”
channel.description: Tech news worth talking about and tech help worth listening to

item.title: By: John Speer
item.dc:creator: John Speer
item.description:
I have this similar setup. However, one computer is a personal computer and the second is my work computer. My work computer has a VPN connection into the corporate network during the day. Since my two computers are on different networks, will this software KVM still work?
John
item.content:encoded:
I have this similar setup. However, one computer is a personal computer and the second is my work computer. My work computer has a VPN connection into the corporate network during the day. Since my two computers are on different networks, will this software KVM still work?

John
